text: Michael Essa is an American Drifter and racing driver who competes in the Formula D series, winning the championship in 2013 in a BMW M3.http://autoweek.com/article/other-motorsports/michael-essa- wins-2013-formula-drift-championship He started his career in autocross racing at the age of 16 and has driven a variety of different cars in his drift career, including a Mazda RX-7, BMW E92, BMW Z4 and a BMW M3 E46. For the 2015 season he will switch to a Chevrolet Camaro.http://www.wreckedmagazine.com/blog/2015/02/13/michael-essa-makes- camaro-and-slp-sponsorship-official-for-2015/ Essa switched back to a BMW E46 M3 in recent years. ==References== Category:Drifting drivers Category:American racing drivers Category:Living people Category:Formula D drivers Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
